titleStmt.title: At a council held at Boston, March 10, 1668. The governour and magistrates being assembled in Council, and in some measure sensible of the many tokens of the Lords displeasure against the cutting short the fruits of the Earth for sundry years past ...
titleStmt.author: Massachusetts. Council.
Rawson, Edward, 1615-1693.

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Signed at end: By the Council, Edward Rawson Secret.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Ms. notes at end of text.
Reproduction of original in: New York Public Library.
